name: Solid
description: Make the object impassable, so other objects cannot move or fall through it.

conditions.name: Is enabled
conditions.description: Test whether the behavior is currently enabled.

actions.name: Set enabled
actions.description: Set whether the object counts as solid or not.

params.name: State
params.description: Set whether the object counts as solid or not.

actions.name: Set tags
actions.description: Set the Solid behavior tags used for collision filtering.

params.name: Tags
params.description: A space-separated list of tags to use for collision filtering with this solid.
